TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TraceSource extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供一组方法和属性，利用这些方法和属性，应用程序可以跟踪代码的执行并将跟踪消息和它们的源关联起来。

span.span: Provides a set of methods and properties that enable applications to trace the execution of code and associate trace messages with their source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类由应用程序用来生成可与应用程序相关联的跟踪。The class is used by applications to produce traces that can be associated with the application. 提供了一些跟踪方法，利用这些跟踪方法，你可以方便地跟踪事件，跟踪数据和发出信息跟踪。 provides tracing methods that allow you to easily trace events, trace data, and issue informational traces. 跟踪输出可通过配置文件设置控制。Trace output from can be controlled by configuration file settings. 配置文件位于与应用程序可执行文件的文件夹，并具有扩展名为.config 文件名称添加应用程序的名称。The configuration file is located in the folder with the application executable and has the name of the application with the .config file name extension added. 例如，TraceSourceSample.exe 的配置文件的名称是 TraceSourceSample.exe.config。配置文件可以用于确定要发送的跟踪信息的位置和要跟踪的活动级别是。For example, the name of the configuration file for TraceSourceSample.exe is TraceSourceSample.exe.config. The configuration file can be used to determine where the trace information is to be sent and what levels of activity are to be traced. 下面的示例显示了示例应用程序配置文件的内容。The following example shows the contents of a sample application configuration file. ```xml ``` 类由源，通常的应用程序名称的名称。The class is identified by the name of a source, typically the name of the application. 来自特定组件的跟踪消息可由启动特定的跟踪源，允许所有消息来自该组件可以轻松识别。The trace messages coming from a particular component can be initiated by a particular trace source, allowing all messages coming from that component to be easily identified. 定义跟踪方法，但实际上并不提供任何特定的机制来生成和存储跟踪数据。 defines tracing methods but does not actually provide any specific mechanism for generating and storing tracing data. 跟踪数据生成的跟踪侦听器，可由跟踪源加载的插件。The tracing data is produced by trace listeners, which are plug-ins that can be loaded by trace sources. > [!NOTE] > 不应在终止期间调用跟踪方法。You should not call the tracing methods during finalization. 执行此操作可能会导致所引发。Doing so can result in an being thrown. 可以通过添加或删除自定义跟踪输出的目标到或从集合中存储的实例属性。You can customize the tracing output's target by adding or removing instances to or from the collection stored in the property. 默认情况下使用的实例生成跟踪输出类。By default, trace output is produced using an instance of the class. 上面的配置文件示例演示了如何移除并添加以生成跟踪输出的跟踪源。The preceding configuration file example demonstrates removing the and adding a to produce the trace output for the trace source. 有关详细信息，请参阅[<侦听器>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/trace-debug/listeners-element-for-source.md)并[ <sharedListeners>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/trace-debug/sharedlisteners-element.md)。For more information, see [<listeners>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/trace-debug/listeners-element-for-source.md) and [<sharedListeners>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/trace-debug/sharedlisteners-element.md). > [!NOTE] > 添加到跟踪侦听器集合可能导致跟踪，时引发异常，如果跟踪侦听器使用的资源不可用。Adding a trace listener to the collection can cause an exception to be thrown while tracing, if a resource used by the trace listener is not available. 条件和引发的异常取决于跟踪侦听器，并不能在本主题中枚举。The conditions and the exception thrown depend on the trace listener and cannot be enumerated in this topic. 可能会很有用，将调用中的方法`try` / `catch`块以检测和处理跟踪侦听器中的任何异常。It may be useful to place calls to the methods in `try`/`catch` blocks to detect and handle any exceptions from trace listeners. 类提供了动态控制跟踪输出的方法。The class provides the means to dynamically control the tracing output. 上面的配置文件示例演示如何将禁用从跟踪源和控制跟踪级别发生的跟踪功能。The preceding configuration file example shows how you can turn off tracing from a trace source and control the level at which tracing occurs. 无需重新编译你的应用程序，可以修改源开关的值。You can modify the value of the source switch without recompiling your application. 有关使用配置文件设置开关的信息，请参阅并[如何： 创建、 初始化和配置跟踪开关](~/docs/framework/debug-trace-profile/how-to-create-initialize-and-configure-trace-switches.md)。For information on using the configuration file to set a switch, see and [How to: Create, Initialize and Configure Trace Switches](~/docs/framework/debug-trace-profile/how-to-create-initialize-and-configure-trace-switches.md). > [!NOTE] > 如果您修改配置文件执行应用程序时，必须停止并重新启动该应用程序或新设置生效，必须在调用方法。If you modify a configuration file while an application is executing, the application must be stopped and restarted or the method must be called before the new settings take effect. 枚举用于定义的跟踪消息的事件类型。The enumeration is used to define the event type of the trace message. 跟踪筛选器使用来确定跟踪侦听器应产生跟踪消息。Trace filters use the to determine if a trace listener should produce the trace message. 跟踪侦听器可根据需要额外的筛选通过跟踪筛选器。The trace listeners can optionally have an additional layer of filtering through a trace filter. 如果跟踪侦听器具有关联的筛选器，侦听器会调用上该筛选器，以确定是否生成跟踪信息的方法。If a trace listener has an associated filter, the listener calls the method on that filter to determine whether or not to produce the trace information. 跟踪侦听器中使用的值类属性， ，和跟踪输出的格式。The trace listeners use the values of the class properties , , and to format trace output. 可以使用配置文件属性来设置， ，和属性。You can use configuration file attributes to set the , , and properties. 下面的示例设置属性设置为`false`和属性设置为 3。The following example sets the property to `false` and the property to 3. ```xml ``` ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用类将转发到侦听器的跟踪。The following code example shows the use of the class to forward traces to listeners. 该示例还演示了交换机和筛选器的使用情况。The example also demonstrates switch and filter usage. [!code-cpp[System.Diagnostics.TraceSource2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.TraceSource2/CPP/tracesource2.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Diagnostics.TraceSource2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.TraceSource2/CS/program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Diagnostics.TraceSource2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.TraceSource2/VB/program.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 源名称用于标识跟踪。The source name is used to identify traces. 它由来确定跟踪侦听器是否应生成跟踪。It is used by a to determine whether a trace listener should produce the trace. 建议的做法是使用应用程序的名称作为源名称。The recommended practice is to use the name of the application for the source name. > [!NOTE] > 不需要创建一个新为每个跟踪请求的实例。It is not necessary to create a new instance for each trace request. 创建一个实例，并将其用于该应用程序的所有跟踪请求。Create one instance and use it for all trace requests for the application. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用构造函数创建一个新对象。The following code example shows the use of the constructor to create a new object. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 源名称用于标识跟踪。The source name is used to identify traces. 它可由以确定是否发生跟踪和来确定是否可生成跟踪。It can be used by a to determine if tracing is to occur and by a to determine whether to produce the trace. 使用的默认源级别以确定是否发生跟踪基于要跟踪的消息的源级别。The default source level is used by an to determine if tracing is to occur based on the source level of the message to be traced. > [!NOTE] > 不需要创建一个新为每个跟踪请求的实例。It is not necessary to create a new instance for each trace request. 创建一个实例，并将其用于该应用程序的所有跟踪请求。Create one instance and use it for all trace requests for the application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性标识应用程序的配置文件中引用的自定义特性。The property identifies the custom attributes referenced in the application's configuration file. 未引用的自定义特性不会枚举。Unreferenced custom attributes are not enumerated. 继承的类类可以通过重写中添加自定义特性方法并返回自定义属性名称的字符串数组。Classes that inherit from the class can add custom attributes by overriding the method and returning a string array of custom attribute names. 下面是指定自定义属性的跟踪源元素的示例`SecondTraceSourceAttribute`:The following is a sample of a trace source element specifying the custom attribute `SecondTraceSourceAttribute`: ```xml ``` ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何显示的自定义特性。The following code sample shows how to display the custom attributes for a . 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性允许筛选消息之前的跟踪源调用侦听器。The property allows the filtering of messages before the trace source calls the listeners. 开关用于检查是否应生成或忽略跟踪调用。The switch is used to check whether trace calls should be generated or ignored. 每个跟踪方法调用方法的以确定是否要继续进行跟踪。Each trace method calls the method of the to determine whether to proceed with the trace. 如果调用返回`true`，则将调用侦听器。If the call returns `true`, the listeners are called.

span.span: Writes trace data to the trace listeners in the collection using the specified event type, event identifier, and trace data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法，例如方法，适用于自动化的工具，但它还允许将附加的其他对象，如异常实例，对此跟踪。The method, like the method, is intended for automated tools, but it also allows the attaching of an additional object, such as an exception instance, to the trace. 方法调用方法返回的对象属性。The method calls the method of the object returned by the property. 如果将返回`true`，调用相应方法上的所有侦听器。If returns `true`, calls the corresponding method on all listeners. 否则为返回而不会调用侦听器的方法。Otherwise, returns without calling the listeners' methods. > [!NOTE] > 对象被限制为最多`id`65,535 的值。The object is limited to a maximum `id` value of 65,535. 如果`id`指定的值是否大于 65,535，对象使用 65,535。If the `id` value specified is greater than 65,535, the object uses 65,535. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法筛选，并将跟踪消息转发到侦听器。The following code example shows the use of the method to filter and forward a trace message to the listeners. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. summary.span: 使用指定的事件类型、事件标识符和跟踪数据数组，将跟踪数据写入 集合中的跟踪侦听器中。

span.span: Writes trace data to the trace listeners in the collection using the specified event type, event identifier, and trace data array.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法，例如方法，适用于自动化的工具，但它还允许附加其他对象，例如异常实例和堆栈跟踪，对此跟踪。The method, like the method, is intended for automated tools, but it also allows the attaching of additional objects, such as an exception instance and a stack trace, to the trace. 方法调用方法返回的对象属性。The method calls the method of the object returned by the property. 如果将返回`true`，调用相应方法上的所有侦听器。If returns `true`, calls the corresponding method on all listeners. 否则为返回而不会调用侦听器的方法。Otherwise, returns without calling the listeners' methods. > [!NOTE] > 对象被限制为最多`id`65,535 的值。The object is limited to a maximum `id` value of 65,535. 如果`id`指定的值是否大于 65,535，对象使用 65,535。If the `id` value specified is greater than 65,535, the object uses 65,535.

exception.span: 终止期间尝试跟踪事件。

span.span: An attempt was made to trace an event during finalization.

summary.span: 将跟踪事件消息写入 集合中的跟踪侦听器中。

span.span: Writes a trace event message to the trace listeners in the collection.

summary.span: 使用指定的事件类型和事件标识符，将跟踪事件消息写入 集合中的跟踪侦听器中。

span.span: Writes a trace event message to the trace listeners in the collection using the specified event type and event identifier.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法旨在与工具可以自动处理的跟踪事件。The method is intended to trace events that can be processed automatically by tools. 例如，监视工具可以通知管理员，如果由特定源跟踪特定事件。For example, a monitoring tool can notify an administrator if a specific event is traced by a specific source. 方法调用方法返回的对象属性。The method calls the method of the object returned by the property. 如果将返回`true`，调用相应方法的每个侦听器。If returns `true`, calls the corresponding method of each listener. 否则为返回而不会调用侦听器的方法。Otherwise, returns without calling the listeners' methods. 跟踪内容是特定于侦听器。The trace content is listener specific. 如果侦听器实现不重写该方法，默认输出是跟踪源、 其数字标识和事件类型的名称。If the method is not overridden by the listener implementation, the default output is the name of the trace source, its numeric identity, and the event type. 更多跟踪内容是依赖于侦听器的属性值。Additional trace content is dependent upon the listener's property value. > [!NOTE] > 对象被限制为最多`id`65,535 的值。The object is limited to a maximum `id` value of 65,535. 如果`id`指定的值是否大于 65,535，使用 65,535。If the `id` value specified is greater than 65,535, the uses 65,535. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法以将跟踪事件传递到侦听器。The following code example shows the use of the method to pass a trace event to the listeners. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Diagnostics.TraceSource2#17](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.TraceSource2/CS/program.cs#17)] [!code-vb[System.Diagnostics.TraceSource2#17](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.TraceSource2/VB/program.vb#17)]

span.span: Writes a trace event message to the trace listeners in the collection using the specified event type, event identifier, and message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法旨在与工具可以自动处理的跟踪事件。The method is intended to trace events that can be processed automatically by tools. 例如，监视工具可以通知管理员，如果由特定源跟踪特定事件。For example, a monitoring tool can notify an administrator if a specific event is traced by a specific source. 方法调用方法返回的对象属性。The method calls the method of the object returned by the property. 如果将返回`true`，调用相应方法的每个侦听器。If returns `true`, calls the corresponding method of each listener. 否则为返回而不会调用侦听器的方法。Otherwise, returns without calling the listeners' methods. 跟踪内容是特定于侦听器。The trace content is listener specific. 如果侦听器实现不重写该方法，默认输出是跟踪源、 其数字标识、 事件类型和消息的名称。If the method is not overridden by the listener implementation, the default output is the name of the trace source, its numeric identity, the event type, and the message. 更多跟踪内容是依赖于侦听器的属性值。Additional trace content is dependent upon the listener's property value. > [!NOTE] > 对象被限制为最多`id`65,535 的值。The object is limited to a maximum `id` value of 65,535. 如果`id`指定的值是否大于 65,535，对象使用 65,535。If the `id` value specified is greater than 65,535, the object uses 65,535. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法以将跟踪事件传递到侦听器。The following code example shows the use of the method to pass a trace event to the listeners. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. summary.span: 使用指定的事件类型、事件标识符以及参数数组和格式，将跟踪事件写入 集合中的跟踪侦听器中。

span.span: Writes a trace event to the trace listeners in the collection using the specified event type, event identifier, and argument array and format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关详细信息`format`参数，请参阅[复合格式设置](~/docs/standard/base-types/composite-formatting.md)。For more information about the `format` parameter, see [Composite Formatting](~/docs/standard/base-types/composite-formatting.md). 方法旨在与工具可以自动处理的跟踪事件。The method is intended to trace events that can be processed automatically by tools. 例如，监视工具可以通知管理员，如果由特定源跟踪特定事件。For example, a monitoring tool can notify an administrator if a specific event is traced by a specific source. 方法调用方法返回的对象属性。The method calls the method of the object returned by the property. 如果将返回`true`，调用相应方法的每个侦听器。If returns `true`, calls the corresponding method of each listener. 否则为返回而不会调用侦听器的方法。Otherwise, returns without calling the listeners' methods. 跟踪内容是特定于侦听器。The trace content is listener specific. 默认值方法写入源名称、 事件类型和数字标识中的跟踪标头，然后调用方法，传递`format`字符串并`args`数组并使用属性设置的格式作为消息输出的字符串。The default method writes the source name, event type, and numeric identity in the trace header, then calls the method, passing the `format` string and `args` array and using the property to format the string as the message output. > [!NOTE] > 对象被限制为最多`id`65,535 的值。The object is limited to a maximum `id` value of 65,535. 如果`id`指定的值是否大于 65,535，对象使用 65,535。If the `id` value specified is greater than 65,535, the object uses 65,535. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法以将跟踪事件传递到侦听器。The following code example shows the use of the method to pass a trace event to the listeners. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Diagnostics.TraceSource2#24](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.TraceSource2/CS/program.cs#24)] [!code-vb[System.Diagnostics.TraceSource2#24](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.TraceSource2/VB/program.vb#24)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法提供了用于读取由用户而不是工具的信息性消息。The method provides an informational message intended to be read by users and not by tools. 调用方法，设置`eventType`到并将作为消息字符串传递的信息性消息。 calls the method, setting `eventType` to and passing the informative message as the message string. 方法又调用方法的每个跟踪侦听器。The method in turn calls the method of each trace listener.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关详细信息`format`参数，请参阅[复合格式设置](~/docs/standard/base-types/composite-formatting.md)。For more information about the `format` parameter, see [Composite Formatting](~/docs/standard/base-types/composite-formatting.md). 方法提供了用于读取由用户而不是工具的信息性消息。The method provides an informational message intended to be read by users and not by tools. 调用方法，设置`eventType`到以及将消息内容以包含格式设置信息的对象数组传递。 calls the method, setting `eventType` to and passing the message content as an object array with formatting information. 方法又调用方法的每个跟踪侦听器。The method in turn calls the method of each trace listener.

MemberSignature.Value: public void TraceTransfer (int id, string message, Guid relatedActivityId);

Public Sub TraceTransfer (id As Integer, message As String, relatedActivityId As Guid)

member this.TraceTransfer : int * string * Guid -> unit

param.name: id
param.span: 事件的数值标识符。

span.span: A numeric identifier for the event.

param.span: 要写入的跟踪消息。

param.span: 标识相关活动的结构。

summary.span: 使用指定的数字标识符、消息和相关活动标识符，将跟踪传输消息写入 集合的跟踪侦听器中。

span.span: Writes a trace transfer message to the trace listeners in the collection using the specified numeric identifier, message, and related activity identifier.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法调用方法中的每个跟踪侦听器属性来写入跟踪信息。The method calls the method of each trace listener in the property to write the trace information. 默认值基类中的方法类将调用方法来处理的调用中，设置`eventType`到并追加的字符串表示形式`relatedActivityId`GUID 传递给`message`。The default method in the base class calls the method to process the call, setting `eventType` to and appending a string representation of the `relatedActivityId` GUID to `message`. 旨在与逻辑操作的使用。 is intended to be used with the logical operations of a . `relatedActivityId`参数与属性的对象。The `relatedActivityId` parameter relates to the property of a object. 如果逻辑运算开始一个活动中，将传输到另一个的第二个活动日志传输通过调用方法。If a logical operation begins in one activity and transfers to another, the second activity logs the transfer by calling the method. 调用将新的活动标识与以前的身份。The call relates the new activity identity to the previous identity. 此功能的最有可能使用者是可以报告跨多个活动的逻辑操作的跟踪查看器。The most likely consumer of this functionality is a trace viewer that can report logical operations that span multiple activities.
